Message:
so the Knights of Longinus
have always been after her.
Everyone hates witches, after all.

That’s why I hid her
underneath my happy mask,
keeping her safe from
the Church this whole time.

Then one day,
just like any other day,

a knight found me
walking through town,
so I tried to run away.

But this knight took
the snacks that I—

that she loves,
and trampled on them,
crushing them into
hundreds of pieces.

The shock of seeing her
favorite snacks ruined
caused her to snap.

She cracked my happy mask
wide open and broke free...
